ygData.subject: Re: (OT) Lower level discrimination was Play Time?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Congratulations.  I truly wish I had your luck, skill, free time... or whatever the difference between your 50 and my 37.  But, I believe you ve
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Ryan Honeyman >
>
> I made level 50 after 9 months, Verant suggested it would take 12
> months to make level 50. I guess I'm smarter than the average
> bard. But clumping me in the powergamers cliq is your own false
> take on this. If you're looking for someone to blame, don't look
> this way.
>
> All I can tell you right now is your tune will change. Mine did.

Congratulations. I truly wish I had your luck, skill, free time... or
whatever the difference between your 50 and my 37. But, I believe you've
misunderstood me. The only comparison I made with your statement and that
of a powergamer is being selfish. I don't equate fast leveler with
powergamer. Maybe some residual irritation of the guy in BB carried over
here? Which, btw, his comments about you having no business in BB at level
50 sound familiar to a certain statement about a level 25-30 having no
business in lguk. There is no blame that I attribute to you at all, nor to
any level 50, powergamer or not. Each person is free to play the game as
they wish and go where they're able. Verant is responsible for the
overcrowding problems, NOT a level 30 player in lguk.

If I sent that tell to you in BB, I would have been curious as to what a
level 50 can find to do in BB... not as a "Get out of my zone!", but as a
"Is there something I don't know about here?"

Or, more than likely,

I wouldn't have said a word. A level 50 is free to travel anywhere they
choose in the game. As is a level 25 even if he _is_ due for a fast death,
barring obvious Verant imposed restrictions (Planes).

As far as my tune changing, if you mean I will start to look at those who
haven't made it to my level as not deserving of playing in my favorite
hunting ground, then you are sorely mistaken. No matter how crowded it
gets, that is an attitude I will never carry. I may petition and complain
to Verant, but _never_ even think someone else is less deserving of being
there than me. Until Verant fixes it, it's a problem we will all share.

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Xegony
